::Zardus::

Zardus frowns, thinking over something for a second.

"Soon, perhaps. Tell me, what kind of weapons do you carry?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> ::Chaostaur::
>     "Ah yes.  Much obliged.  I'm not a big fan of water.  Now then, 
> down to buisiness.  Who can I kill for you.  Your idiotic subordinate 
> perhaps?"  He grins an evil grin and his black optics glint in the 
> sunlight.
